alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Monroe; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 6:02AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Monroe, northeastern Upson and southeastern Lamar Counties through 645 AM EDT... At 601 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Yatesville, or 10 miles south of Barnesville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, up to penny sized hail and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Locations impacted include... Forsyth, Yatesville, Culloden, Logtown, Bolingbroke, Dames Ferry, Russellville, Brent and Plant Scherer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EDT for central and west central Georgia.
